pages.text: Victus is built around the around the idea of $(thing)Heart Aspects$(). These are essentially secondary abilities applied on top of your health bar, most of which activate when the heart they cover gets broken. After being broken, they have to $(l:victus:basics/recharging)recharge$(), which takes a certain amount of time per aspect.

The health bar you will slowly build up while playing is $(thing)kept between deaths$(). It may also exceed 10 aspects, in which case only the first 10 will recharge and activate should you lose access to your additional hearts.$(p)To get started, take a look at $(l:victus:basics/crafting_aspects)Crafting Aspects$() for basics on how to obtain your first aspect, as well as $(l:victus:basics/aspect_maintenance)Aspect Maintenance$() before you decide which one to choose.
